__e: Now, I believe when God said that, he was thinking of deer season in Wheelsy and how much damn fun it is to shoot a buck or two!
There's the deer fur and the blood and the dent, just like I said.
Mother understands in a second what this deer blood and fur means, and somehow she's right.
One time he snuck up behind a sleeping deer and just sawed its head right off-- it was sick!
I thought you said if you saw a deer you shouldn't fucking swerve!
It was the first deer I've seen in a year. Now I have nothing.
I would bet my fucking house on a pig flying out of your ass first.
Granddad's deer stand's still up here, so, probably about time for somebody's first hunting trip.
